SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.swing

Interface SwingDocumentListener

All Superinterfaces:
DocumentListener, EventListener
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface SwingDocumentListener extends DocumentListener
A helper interface that serves as a demultiplexer for DocumentEvent, i.e., update events received by either of the three methods insertUpdate(DocumentEvent), removeUpdate(DocumentEvent), and changedUpdate(DocumentEvent) are mapped to the single method update(DocumentEvent).
